Articles.Content:
Hello,

my game is starting up really slow. It takes severaly seconds to load sound files that appear the be only a few KB big. Other assets seeem to be mostly unaffected.

This does cause a severly longer loading time at startup.

so far i have tried the following:

-removed all mods from the game

-defragmentated the HD

-deactivated the anti virus scanner

-deinstalled the game, deleted the game folder and reinstalled the game

Nothing has worked so far.

The game worked fine 2 weeks ago.

The only significant change since then is, that i installed the AMD Beta Graphics driver for the Mantle support.

What could cause the loading screen to get that slow?

My Specs are:

AMD FX 8350

HIS Radeon 7950 IceQÃ‚Â²

16 GB RAM

The usual cause of very slow startup times is having installed but disconnected network devices (e.g. do you have, or have ever had, Hamachi installed? If so, uninstall it. If it still doesn't work then search this forum and google for advice on how to remove all traces from your machine.)

If it isn't that then we will probably need a log file (see the sticky thread for details on how to find and upload your output_log.txt/player.log file) to help you further...
Unistalling Hamachi did indeed help. Which is kinda odd, because i did not install it recently.
